title: Lab Skills: How to Turn a Curve into a Straight Line

media:group.media:title: Lab Skills: How to Turn a Curve into a Straight Line
media:group.media:description: I often joke with my students that I became a Biologist because I hated Calculus, and thus I don't like dealing with curves on my graphs - I prefer straight lines.  In this video, I show you how to use semilog paper to turn exponential curves into straight lines.
